Game.Name: Fairly OddParents!, The - Clash with the Anti-World (Europe) (En,De,Es,Nl)
Game.plot: An experiment gone wrong has turned Timmy's world into the Anti-World where everything is opposite -- even Timmy and his Fairy Godparents! Help Timmy fight through the Anti-lands to turn his world back to normal.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/928494.html
